testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to access the Visitor Purpose information of the user whose id is
testcase.name: Verify that a POST request to `/api/visitorsPurposeId` with valid authorization and correct data returns a

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected status code <200> but was <403>.

testcase.failure:
* The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/visitorsPurposeId" path parameters.................passed * The api user prepares a POST request to send to the api visitorsPurposeid endpoint containing the information 1259..passed * The api user sends a POST request and saves the returned response.........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................failed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..skipped * The api user verifies that the data in the response body includes "1259", "purpose update", "came for student visit" and "2025-01-06 18:12:16"..skipped
